items.name: Ron Ben
items.text: "Working with HolyLabs was effortless. They understood our vision and delivered solutions that exceeded expectations across both of our companies."

items.name: Noam Carmeli

items.name: Dan Antebi
items.text: "Professional, detail-oriented, and genuinely invested in our success. We couldn't have asked for a better development partner."

apps.title: Your App. Both Platforms.
apps.tagline: We build MVPs and production-ready mobile apps with React Native — one codebase for iOS and Android. No bloated timelines. No surprise costs.
apps.proofLine: 20 + apps launched to App Store & Google Play — VPN, eSIM, fitness, delivery & more.

oneCodebase.title: One codebase, both platforms
oneCodebase.description: React Native means you don't pay twice.

apps.pricingNote: Every project starts with a free 30-minute strategy call. No commitment.

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.note: Complex features, custom integrations, dedicated PM

roamjet.name: RoamJet eSIM

step1.name: Strategy Call (Free)
step1.description: We learn your idea, budget, and timeline. You get an honest assessment.

step2.name: Roadmap & Proposal
step2.description: We send a clear scope, fixed price, and delivery date within 48 hours.

step3.name: Build Sprints
step3.description: Weekly demos. You see progress every 7 days. No black boxes.

step4.name: Launch & Support
step4.description: We submit to App Store/Google Play. Post-launch bug fixes included for 30 days.

q1.question: How long does an MVP take?
q1.answer: Most MVPs ship in 6-8 weeks. Complex apps take 10-14 weeks.

q2.question: What if I don't have a technical background?
q2.answer: Perfect. Most of our clients don't. We translate your vision into specs.

q3.question: Do you offer maintenance after launch?
q3.answer: Yes. We offer monthly retainer plans or ad-hoc support.

q4.question: What's included in the $2,000 MVP?
q4.answer: Core user flows, one platform (iOS or Android), Firebase backend, App Store submission.

q5.question: Can I see your previous work?
q5.answer: Yes — scroll up. All apps are live and downloadable.

web.title: Websites That Actually Convert.
web.tagline: We design and build high-performance landing pages and websites using Next.js — fast, SEO-ready, and built to turn visitors into customers. No templates. No guesswork.
web.proofLine: 15+ websites launched for startups, SaaS, and service businesses.

conversionFocused.title: Conversion-focused design
conversionFocused.description: Every element has a job: get the click.

fastDelivery.title: 2-week delivery
fastDelivery.description: Landing pages in 5–7 days. Full sites in 10–14 days.

web.pricingNote: All projects include 30 days of post-launch support. Payment plans available.

launchPage.name: Launch Page
launchPage.note: 1 conversion-focused landing page, mobile responsive, SEO basics, 5–7 days

businessWebsite.name: Business Website
businessWebsite.note: 3–5 page site, custom design, CMS, SEO setup, 10–14 days

webApp.name: Web Application
webApp.note: Full-stack app, auth, database, API integrations, 3–6 weeks

simnetiq.name: Simnetiq
simnetiq.description: E-commerce landing page for global eSIM brand. 4.2% conversion rate. Launched in 6 days.

vitrix.name: Vitrix
vitrix.description: Marketing website for fitness app. Custom animations, mobile-first. 12k visitors in first month.

holylabs.name: HolyLabs
holylabs.description: Agency website with multi-language support. Built in Next.js. SEO-optimized.

step1.name: Free Strategy Call (15 min)
step1.description: We learn your goals, review your current site (if any), and see if we're a fit.

step2.name: Proposal & Wireframes (48 hrs)
step2.description: You get a clear scope, fixed price, and rough wireframes before you commit.

step3.name: Design & Build (1–2 weeks)
step3.description: We share progress every 3–4 days. You give feedback. We iterate fast.

step4.name: Launch & Support
step4.description: We handle deployment, test everything, and stay available for 30 days post-launch.

q1.question: How long does a landing page take?
q1.answer: Most landing pages launch in 5–7 business days. Full websites take 10–14 days.

q2.question: Do you work with Webflow/WordPress?
q2.answer: We specialize in Next.js and React for performance. We can work with Webflow if needed.

q3.question: What if I need changes after launch?
q3.answer: All projects include 30 days of free support. After that, we offer monthly maintenance plans.

q4.question: Can you redesign my existing site?
q4.answer: Yes. We'll audit your current site and propose a redesign plan on our strategy call.

q5.question: What do I need to provide?
q5.answer: Your brand assets (logo, colors, fonts) and content (copy, images). We can help with copy for an additional fee.

automations.eyebrow: STOP DOING MANUALLY WHAT SOFTWARE CAN DO FOR YOU
automations.title: Automate the Busywork.
automations.tagline: We build custom automations that connect your tools, eliminate repetitive tasks, and run your operations 24/7 — so you can focus on growth, not grunt work.
automations.proofLine: 50+ workflows built for startups, agencies, and e-commerce brands.

connectTools.title: Connect any tools
connectTools.description: CRM, email, Slack, spreadsheets, payments — 500+ integrations.

eliminateManual.title: Eliminate manual work
eliminateManual.description: Lead routing, data sync, reporting, follow-ups — all automated.

builtToLast.title: Built to last
builtToLast.description: n8n & Make.com for flexibility, speed, and zero lock-in.

support.title: Ongoing support
support.description: If something breaks, we fix it. 30-day support included.

automations.pricingNote: A $1,500 automation saving 10 hrs/week = $26,000/year saved. Pays for itself in 3 weeks.

starterWorkflow.name: Starter Workflow
starterWorkflow.note: 1 automation (up to 5 steps), 2 tool connections, documentation, 14-day support

growthSystem.name: Growth System
growthSystem.note: 3–5 connected automations, multi-tool integration, error handling, 30-day support

operationsOverhaul.name: Full Operations Overhaul
operationsOverhaul.note: Complete workflow audit, 5+ automations, priority support, training

crmUpdates.after: Auto-created contacts with all data synced

ecommerce.name: E-commerce Brand
ecommerce.description: Automated order-to-fulfillment pipeline. 15 hours/week saved, zero fulfillment errors.

agency.name: Marketing Agency
agency.description: Automated client reporting + lead routing. 8 hours/week saved per team member.

saas.name: SaaS Startup
saas.description: Automated user onboarding + trial nurture. 2x trial-to-paid conversion.

step1.name: Free Automation Audit (30 min)
step1.description: We map your current workflows and identify the biggest time leaks.

step2.name: Custom Proposal (48 hrs)
step2.description: Clear scope: which automations, expected time savings, fixed price.

step3.name: Build & Test (1–2 weeks)
step3.description: We build your workflows, test thoroughly, and document everything.

step4.name: Deploy & Support (30 days)
step4.description: We launch, train your team, monitor for issues, and optimize.

q1.question: What tools can you connect?
q1.answer: Almost anything — CRMs (HubSpot, Salesforce), email (Gmail, Mailchimp), Slack, Notion, Google Sheets, Airtable, Stripe, Shopify, Calendly, and 500+ more via APIs.

q2.question: How is this different from Zapier?
q2.answer: Zapier is great for simple tasks. We use n8n and Make.com for complex, multi-step workflows with better logic, error handling, and no per-task fees.

q3.question: What if my automation breaks?
q3.answer: All projects include 14–30 days of support. We also offer monthly maintenance retainers for ongoing monitoring.

q4.question: How long does it take?
q4.answer: Simple workflows: 3–5 days. Complex systems: 1–2 weeks. We'll give you a timeline on the audit call.

q5.question: Do I own the automation?
q5.answer: Yes. We build on n8n (self-hosted) or Make.com (your account). You have full ownership and access.

marketing.title: Facebook Ads That
marketing.eyebrow: FOR E-COMMERCE, LOCAL BUSINESSES & COURSE CREATORS
marketing.tagline: We manage Facebook & Instagram ad campaigns for businesses that want real revenue — not vanity metrics. Strategy, creative, and optimization — all handled.
marketing.proofLine: Currently managing $50K+/month in client ad spend with avg. 3.2x ROAS

fullFunnel.title: Full-Funnel Strategy
fullFunnel.description: We don't just run ads — we build systems. Cold traffic, retargeting, and conversions.

creative.title: Creative That Converts
creative.description: We write copy and design ads based on what's working now — not templates.

transparent.title: Transparent Reporting
transparent.description: Weekly updates. Real numbers. No agency jargon.

yourAccount.title: Your Account, Your Data
yourAccount.description: You own everything. We just make it work.

ecommerce.name: E-commerce Brand
ecommerce.description: Scaled a jewelry brand from $3K to $18K/month in revenue using Meta Ads and dynamic retargeting.

dental.name: Local Dental Practice
dental.description: Generated consistent new patient bookings through Facebook lead forms and automated follow-up.

course.name: Online Course Creator
course.description: Launched a course campaign that generated $28K in sales over 14 days with $4K ad spend.

adStrategy.title: Ad Strategy & Funnel Design
adStrategy.description: We map your customer journey and build a campaign structure that guides cold traffic to conversion.

creatives.title: Ad Creatives & Copywriting
creatives.description: We create scroll-stopping visuals and persuasive copy — designed to perform, not just look pretty.

management.title: Campaign Management
management.description: Daily monitoring, A/B testing, audience refinement, and scaling what works.

tracking.title: Tracking & Analytics
tracking.description: Pixel setup, conversion tracking, and weekly performance reports you'll actually understand.

starter.name: Campaign Setup
starter.note: Up to 3 campaigns, 3 ad sets each, 3 ads per set

growth.name: A/B Testing + Translations
growth.note: Full campaign setup with A/B testing, up to 3 languages

marketing.pricingNote: Ad spend is billed directly to your account — we never mark it up.

step1.name: Audit & Strategy Call
step1.description: We review your current setup, define your goals, and map out the campaign structure.

step2.name: Creative & Copy Development
step2.description: We create 3–5 ad variations based on what's working in your niche.

step3.name: Campaign Launch
step3.description: We set up targeting, tracking, and launch your first campaigns.

step4.name: Optimization & Scaling
step4.description: We kill what's not working, scale what is, and test new angles.

step5.name: Weekly Reporting
step5.description: You get a clear performance breakdown — no fluff, just results.

q1.question: What platforms do you work with?
q1.answer: We specialize in Meta (Facebook + Instagram) ads. For Google, TikTok, or other platforms, we can refer you to trusted partners.

q2.question: How much ad spend do I need?
q2.answer: We recommend starting with at least $1,000–$2,000/month in ad spend. Below that, it's hard to gather enough data to optimize.

q3.question: How soon will I see results?
q3.answer: Most campaigns start generating leads or sales within the first 1–2 weeks. Real optimization kicks in around week 3–4.

q4.question: Do you create the ads or do I need to provide them?
q4.answer: We handle everything — copy, creative, and strategy. Just send us your brand assets and we'll take it from there.

q5.question: Can I pause the service?
q5.answer: Yes. We work month-to-month with no long-term contracts. You can pause or cancel anytime.

q6.question: What if it's not working?
q6.answer: We'll tell you. If the numbers don't make sense, we'll recommend pausing or pivoting — not burning your budget.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: HolyLabs ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services.

informationCollect.title: 2. Information We Collect
informationCollect.intro: We may collect information about you in various ways:
items: Personal Data: Name, email address, phone number, and other contact information you provide when contacting us.
Usage Data: Information about how you use our website, including pages visited, time spent, and navigation patterns.
Device Data: Information about your device, browser type, IP address, and operating system.

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.intro: We use the information we collect to:
items: Respond to your inquiries and provide customer support
Improve our website and services
Send you updates about our services (with your consent)
Analyze usage patterns to enhance user experience
Comply with legal obligations

informationSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
informationSharing.intro: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
items: With service providers who assist us in operating our website
To comply with legal requirements or respond to lawful requests
To protect our rights, privacy, safety, or property

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

yourRights.title: 6. Your Rights
items: Access the personal information we hold about you
Request correction of inaccurate information
Request deletion of your personal information
Withdraw consent for data processing
Object to certain processing activities

contactUs.title: 7. Contact Us
contactUs.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

whatAreCookies.title: 1. What Are Cookies
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience.

howWeUse.title: 2. How We Use Cookies
items: Remember your preferences and settings
Analyze how our website is used
Improve our website performance
Provide personalized content

typesOfCookies.title: 3. Types of Cookies We Use
items: Essential Cookies: Required for the website to function properly.
Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.
Preference Cookies: Remember your settings and preferences.

managingCookies.title: 4. Managing Cookies
managingCookies.content: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of our website.

contactUs.title: 5. Contact Us
contactUs.intro: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at:
